subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Travis Ford is leaving as the head coach at Massachusetts to take over the Oklahoma State program, both universities confirmed. Oklahoma State said it planned to formally introduce Ford at a news conference on Thursday. The job became open April 1 when Sean Sutton resigned under pressure.
